cast.name: 阿格涅兹卡·格罗乔斯卡 Agnieszka Grochowska

introduction: Borrowing from the codes of the psychological thriller, Safe & Silent looks to show how technological innovations and an obsession with security can destroy the family unit. The pitch is as follows: in an ultra-modern housing development, Kinga - newly separated from her husband - is focused on a fresh start for her and her two children, but the omnipresence of surveillance cameras in her home changes everything.
